title: (x) "A Cultivated Eye" condensed headline in NYT Magazine - Giorgio {Marc O}
author: CM

comments.content: Does anyone know? IT's very pretty.

It's Giorgio, a custom version of Corvinus designed by Christian Schwartz for the New York Times Magazine.

[http://christianschwartz.com/giorgio.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112220619/http:/christianschwartz.com/giorgio.shtml "http://christianschwartz.com/giorgio.shtml")
thx so much. that's very helpful.

[Niagara](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112220619/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/niagara_2/) is similar.

[Quirinus](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112220619/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/quirinus_bold/) and [Skyline](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112220619/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/skyline_bold_condensed/) are alternatives, though heavier.
Didn't you used to live in San Francisco?
